posts.post_content:
Free s/h.  Payment:  Paypal gift preferred; Paypal goods please add 3%.  Check/MO fine. 


***** PLEASE ***** Correspondence ONLY to – [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

In other words – NO PMs –  you can comment in thread, but please email to follow up.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=572832&d=1685122030[/IMG]

Red Cobb, Sov.350 – sold

Note – Few creases ... :p .... ~¼ inch tear upper border.

 

*** Always open for trades. Especially T206 Hindu or T207 BL Series. *** 

Thanks, Scott

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ price drop ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

Love to trade, Scott

Just a note to be very careful when responding to emails.  You are opening yourself up a little bit to scammers by corresponding with email only and not via Net54 PMs.  

You'll probably be fine with due diligence but just a word of caution based on other member's experiences with email correspondence.
